features.description: Public application form - Basic information fields (name, email, phone)
steps: Verify name input field is present and accepts text
Verify email input field is present and accepts email format
Verify phone input field is present and accepts phone format
Fill in all basic fields with valid data
features.notes: Browser automation test passed. All form fields (name, email, phone) are present and accept valid input without validation errors.

features.description: Public application form - Resume upload functionality
steps: Upload a valid PDF resume file
Verify file upload success indicator appears
features.notes: Browser automation test passed. Resume upload field found, PDF file uploaded successfully, success indicator and filename displayed.

features.description: Resume upload - File type validation (PDF, DOC, DOCX only)
steps: Attempt to upload invalid file type (.txt, .jpg)
features.notes: Browser automation test passed. File type validation working - invalid .txt file triggers error message, valid PDF file is accepted and filename displayed successfully.

features.description: Resume upload - File size validation (max 10MB)
steps: Attempt to upload file larger than 10MB
Verify error message appears stating size limit
features.notes: Browser automation test passed. File size validation working - 11MB file was rejected (not displayed), file under 10MB accepted and displayed successfully.

features.description: Form validation - Email format validation
steps: Enter invalid email format (missing @, no domain)
Attempt to submit or blur field
features.notes: Email validation working. Invalid formats detected (missing @, no domain), valid emails accepted without errors.

features.description: Form validation - Phone number format validation
steps: Enter invalid phone number (letters, too short)
Enter valid phone number with various formats
Verify all valid formats are accepted
features.notes: Phone validation working. Short phone numbers trigger error, various formats accepted (with/without dashes, parentheses, country code).

features.description: Form validation - Required fields validation
steps: Verify all required field errors are displayed
features.notes: Browser automation test passed. Form prevents submission with empty required fields. Found 4 invalid required inputs and error elements displayed. Form stayed on same page without submitting.

features.description: Form submission - Successful submission with all valid data
steps: Fill all required fields with valid data
Verify form clears or redirects to confirmation page
features.notes: Browser automation test passed. Form accepts valid data for all fields, allows resume upload, submits successfully, and displays success indicator (2 success elements found on page).

features.description: Form submission - Data persistence to Supabase database
steps: Submit application form with unique test data
Check admin dashboard for new applicant
Verify all submitted data appears correctly

features.description: Form submission - Resume file upload to Supabase storage
steps: Verify resume download link is present
Download resume and verify file integrity

features.description: Email verification - Verification email sent on submission
steps: Check email inbox for verification email

features.description: Email verification - Click verification link to confirm email
steps: Verify applicant status updates in database

features.description: SMS consent - Checkbox for SMS notifications opt-in
steps: Verify SMS consent checkbox is present
Verify SMS consent is recorded in database

features.description: SMS consent - SMS opt-in status saved to database
steps: Submit application with SMS consent checked
Verify SMS consent field is true
Submit another application without SMS consent
Verify SMS consent field is false

features.description: Admin authentication - Login page with email/password
steps: Verify email and password fields are present

features.description: Admin authentication - Invalid credentials error handling
steps: Verify user remains on login page

features.description: Admin authentication - Protected routes require authentication
steps: Attempt to navigate directly to admin dashboard URL without login
Verify access to dashboard is granted

features.description: Admin authentication - Logout functionality
Admin authentication - Session persistence
steps: Verify session state based on remember me option

features.description: Admin dashboard - Display list of all applicants
steps: Verify all submitted applications are displayed
Verify basic applicant info is shown (name, email, date)

features.description: Admin dashboard - View individual applicant details
steps: Click on an applicant from the list
Verify detailed view opens with all applicant information
Verify resume download link is present
Verify all form fields are displayed

features.description: Admin dashboard - Filter applicants by status
steps: Verify only new applicants are displayed

features.description: Admin dashboard - Filter applicants by date range
steps: Verify only applicants within date range are shown

features.description: Admin dashboard - Filter applicants by email verification status
Admin dashboard - Filter applicants by SMS consent
Admin dashboard - Sort applicants by name (A-Z, Z-A)
steps: Click name column header to sort

features.description: Admin dashboard - Sort applicants by submission date (newest/oldest)
steps: Verify applicants sorted by newest first
Verify applicants sorted by oldest first

features.description: Admin dashboard - Sort applicants by status
steps: Verify sort order is logical (New, Reviewed, etc.)

features.description: Admin dashboard - Update applicant status (New, Reviewed, Contacted, Hired, Rejected)
Admin dashboard - Add notes to applicant profile
steps: Verify note appears in applicant profile
Verify note persists on page refresh

features.description: Admin dashboard - Export applicants to CSV
steps: Apply filters to select specific applicants
Open CSV and verify all applicant data is present

features.description: Admin dashboard - CSV export includes all fields
steps: Verify all form fields are included as columns

features.description: Admin dashboard - CSV export respects active filters
steps: Apply status filter to show only 'New' applicants
Verify CSV only contains filtered applicants

features.description: Admin dashboard - Pagination for large applicant lists
steps: Login to admin dashboard with 50+ applicants
Verify next set of applicants loads

features.description: Admin dashboard - Search applicants by name
steps: Verify search results filter in real-time
Verify only matching applicants are shown

features.description: Admin dashboard - Search applicants by email
steps: Verify applicant with matching email appears

features.description: Visitor analytics - Track page views
steps: Login to admin dashboard analytics section
Verify page view counts are recorded
Verify page view data updates with new visits

features.description: Visitor analytics - Track unique visitors
steps: Verify unique visitor count does not increment again

features.description: Visitor analytics - Track form submission conversions
steps: Check initial conversion rate in analytics

features.description: Visitor analytics - Display analytics charts/graphs
UTM tracking - Capture UTM parameters from URL
steps: Verify UTM parameters are recorded with applicant data

features.description: UTM tracking - Display UTM data in admin dashboard
steps: View applicant details who came via UTM link
Verify UTM source, medium, campaign data is displayed
Verify UTM data is exportable in CSV

features.description: UTM tracking - Analytics breakdown by traffic source
steps: Verify different UTM sources are categorized
Verify conversion rates by source are shown

features.description: Multi-language support - English (en) language option
steps: Verify all text content displays in English

features.description: Multi-language support - Spanish (es) language option
steps: Verify all text content displays in Spanish
Verify validation messages are in Spanish

features.description: Multi-language support - French (fr) language option
steps: Verify all text content displays in French
Verify footer content is in French

features.description: Multi-language support - Language preference persistence
Multi-language support - Language switcher accessible on all pages
steps: Verify language switcher is still accessible

features.description: Dark mode - Toggle dark mode on/off
steps: Verify page theme switches to dark
Verify page returns to light theme

features.description: Dark mode - Dark mode preference persistence
steps: Verify dark mode preference is saved

features.description: Dark mode - System preference detection
steps: Visit site for first time (no saved preference)
Verify site defaults to dark mode
Verify site defaults to light mode

features.description: Dark mode - All components properly styled in dark mode
steps: Verify buttons have dark mode styles
Verify forms are readable in dark mode
Verify no white backgrounds bleeding through
Verify text contrast meets accessibility standards

features.description: Cookie consent - GDPR/CCPA cookie banner display
steps: Visit site for first time (clear cookies)
Verify GDPR/CCPA compliance text is present
features.notes: Browser automation test passed. Cookie consent banner appears 2 seconds after page load when localStorage is cleared. Banner includes cookie information and accept/reject options.

features.description: Cookie consent - Accept all cookies option
features.notes: Browser automation test passed. Accept All button dismisses banner, saves consent preferences to localStorage, and banner does not reappear on page reload.

features.description: Cookie consent - Reject non-essential cookies option
steps: Verify analytics cookies are NOT set
Verify essential cookies are still set
features.notes: Browser automation test passed. Reject/Essential Only button saves consent with essential=true, analytics=false, marketing=false. Banner dismisses properly.

features.description: Cookie consent - Cookie preferences customization
steps: Verify detailed cookie categories are shown
Verify only selected cookies are set

features.description: Cookie consent - Privacy policy link in banner
steps: Verify policy content explains cookie usage

features.description: Accessibility - Keyboard navigation throughout site
steps: Using only keyboard (Tab, Enter, Arrow keys)
Verify all interactive elements are reachable

features.description: Accessibility - Screen reader support (ARIA labels)
steps: Verify all interactive elements are announced
Verify form fields have proper labels

features.description: Accessibility - Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards
steps: Run color contrast checker on all text
Verify text-to-background contrast is at least 4.5:1
Check both light and dark mode
Verify button states have sufficient contrast

features.description: Accessibility - Focus visible on all interactive elements
steps: Verify visible focus ring/outline on each element
Verify focus is never lost or hidden
Check buttons, links, form inputs, toggles

features.description: Accessibility - Skip to main content link
steps: Verify 'Skip to main content' link appears
Verify focus moves to main content area

features.description: Accessibility - Semantic HTML structure
steps: Verify proper heading hierarchy (h1, h2, h3)
Verify semantic tags used (nav, main, footer, article)
Verify no div/span soup for structural elements

features.description: Accessibility - Form error messages announced to screen readers
steps: Verify focus moves to first error

features.description: Accessibility controls - Font size adjustment
Accessibility controls - High contrast mode toggle
steps: Verify colors adjust to high contrast palette
Disable and verify return to normal

features.description: Accessibility controls - Reduce motion option
steps: Verify animations are disabled or reduced

features.description: Supabase - Database connection established
steps: Check for connection errors in console

features.description: Supabase - Row level security policies enforced
steps: Attempt to access data without authentication
Test public read access where appropriate

features.description: Supabase - Storage bucket configured for resumes
steps: Verify file appears in Supabase storage bucket

features.description: Supabase - Real-time updates in admin dashboard
steps: Submit new application in different browser
Verify new applicant appears in dashboard without refresh

features.description: Supabase - Email service configured
steps: Verify email sending does not throw errors

features.description: OpenAPI documentation - API endpoints documented
steps: Verify all API endpoints are listed

features.description: OpenAPI documentation - Interactive API testing
OpenAPI documentation - Authentication examples included
steps: Verify example requests include auth headers

steps: Test in both portrait and landscape

features.description: Responsive design - Desktop viewport (1024px+)

steps: Close menu and verify it closes

features.description: Homepage - Company branding and logo
steps: Verify logo is high quality (not pixelated)
Verify branding is consistent across pages

features.description: Homepage - Hero section with call-to-action
steps: Verify hero section is prominently displayed

features.description: Homepage - Services/offerings section
steps: Verify icons or images accompany descriptions

features.description: Homepage - Testimonials or social proof
Navigation - Main navigation menu present on all pages
Navigation - Sticky header on scroll

Verify header returns to original state

steps: Verify copyright symbol and year are present

steps: Verify focus moves and highlights new field

Complete step 1 and move to step 2

features.description: Admin dashboard UI - Data table with proper styling

features.description: Admin dashboard UI - Status badges with color coding

Verify only necessary JS bundles load

steps: Verify main bundle is under 200KB gzipped
